amendatorysection.catchline: Annual percentage rate; violation; effect; fee; limitation.
amendatorysection.para: (1) No licensee shall charge, contract for, or receive fees, interest and charges in excess of an annual percentage rate of thirty-six percent, including, but not limited to all charges for any ancillary products or services, and any other charges or fees in connection with a delayed deposit transaction. Any delayed deposit transaction made in violation of this section is void and uncollectable as to any principal, interest, fees, or any other charges.

(2) The fees set forth in this section shall not be charged to individuals on active duty military or their spouses or dependents in an amount that exceeds what is allowed under 10 U.S.C. 987, as such section existed on January 1, 2018.
